participant_1.name: Linda
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and supportive, always putting family first.
participant_1.background: I'm always there for my friends and family. I drive more than an hour each way to work. I have one grandson and one daughter. My car is over 20 years old. I do not see my family very often, but I am close to them.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and family-oriented, enjoys simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: My favorite websites are pet health sites, especially ones with information on poodles. I enjoy watching tennis and golf on tv. I read a lot. I am a guy that enjoys being a guy. I am short.

content.text: Hey there!
Hey there, what's up?
Not much, just trying to find a new job. What do you do for work?
I'm a stay at home dad, and I also do some freelance web design on the side.
That's awesome! Do you like it?
I love it! It's great being able to spend so much time with my son, and I enjoy the work I do as well.
That's great to hear! How old is your son?
He's 5, and he's the light of my life.
I bet he is! That's so sweet.
Yeah, he's a great kid.
What's your favorite thing about being a stay at home dad?
Just being able to be there for him all the time. Being able to see him grow and learn every day is amazing.
That's so sweet!
Yeah, I love it.
Do you have any hobbies?
I love to read, and I also enjoy watching tennis and golf on TV.
Oh cool! I like to read too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and mysteries.
Oh cool! I love historical fiction too.
Yeah, it's so interesting to learn about other times and places.
I know right!
Yeah
